title: Augusta County: Thomas M. Smiley to His Aunt, November 12, 1862
summary: Thomas M. Smiley winter camp on Valley Turnpike near Winchester. It is snowing and they are waiting for their tents. He asks about a rumored wedding back home.
keywords: Battle Description, Camp Life, Death/Casualties, Home Front, Military Authority, Prisons/Prisoners, Troop Movement, American Civil War
